document.full_text: french striker eric hassli scored twice as the vancouver whitecaps marked their mls debut with an impressive 4-2 victory over canadian rivals toronto on saturday while the new york red bulls inflicted a second successive defeat on the seattle sounders.
document.title: whitecaps start mls life in style, red bulls sink seattle
lines_and_colors: french striker eric hassli scored twice as the vancouver whitecaps marked their mls debut with an impressive 4-2 victory over canadian rivals toronto on saturday while the new york red bulls inflicted a second successive defeat on the seattle sounders.
